page.title: 06LIFE STYLES cont
page.content: play swing ball with my Nanna.Then I go in because Nanna and Grandad do some gardening so I go and play with my dog,Ben.Before I go to bed I watch T.V. ______________________________________ A day in the life of Ben Beresford. Tuesday 18th June 1985.Woken at twenty past seven by Mum.Got washed and dressed and went to feed my fish. I fed the fish found my shoes.Went to Gran's.Ate 2 tomatoes and had a drink of cocoa.Went to my friend Ross's. Walked up to school.I had to take my bag because I had been off school on Monday and I had to take my cubs kit.Did some Brockhole work with Mr Clifford until playtime.Played three and in.I scored 2.The others went swimming.Tony and I stayed at school becausa we didn't need practise.Did the reading test with Mr Clifford got
